alert.note: Alert for Crosby; Floyd; Hale; Lubbock (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 12:41AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lubbock, southwestern Floyd, Crosby and southeastern Hale Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1241 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Idalou, or 13 miles southeast of Abernathy, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lubbock, Slaton, Floydada, Abernathy, Crosbyton, White River Lake, Shallowater, Idalou, Ralls, Lockney, Petersburg, Lorenzo, Ransom Canyon, Kalgary, Cone, Lubbock South Plains Mall, Caprock, Lubbock International Airport, Texas Tech University, and Downtown Lubbock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
